content: Our first meetup was in December 2022 so in December we're celebrating 3 years! Should we return to our roots at meet at Hamilton? 7pm? Sunday, December 14th or 21st? Other dates or times? What do you think?
For sure. I forgot that summer is over now.
Later is better for @Dave Hanft :smile:
Later is fine. I just meant that Summer was our exploring phase, so I'm happy to go back home to Hamilton.
Hamilton's sounds like a plan! I vote for Dec 14th. Anyone up for a fun Yankee Swap? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White_elephant_gift_exchange
